title: Natural Language Understanding for Medication Reminders
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to understand and respond to my voice commands for medication reminders so that I can manage my health efficiently without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Medication and Health Management
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medications and monitor my health so that I can maintain my independence and manage my health efficiently without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Proactive Conversation Starters for Social Inclusion
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to initiate conversations about my interests, like classical music, so that I can feel more socially engaged and connected with others.

title: Voice-Activated Task Management
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to use voice commands to manage my medication reminders, calendar, and make video calls so that I can maintain my independence and stay connected with my family without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Error Recovery Mechanisms – Clarification Prompts for User Support
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want the system to provide clarification prompts when I make a mistake or the system doesn't understand my command, so that I can feel more confident and less intimidated while using the technology.

title: Personalized Voice Profiles for Enhanced User Interaction
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want a personalized voice profile so that I can interact with ALFRED in a way that feels familiar and comfortable, making it easier for me to manage my daily tasks and stay connected with my family.

title: Cognitive Ease through Voice Interaction
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to provide clear and simple voice instructions so that I can interact with the system confidently and manage my daily tasks without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Medication Management Support
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medications so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence at home.
